articles.title: Euro marks 20 eventful years - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The euro on Saturday marks 20 years since people began to use the single European currency, overcoming initial doubts, price concerns and a debt crisis to spread across the region.
articles.content:

articles.author: Rebecca Daly
articles.title: Irish to be fully recognised as official EU language as number of translation staff increases - Irish Mirror
articles.description: As of New Year’s Day, the derogation of the Irish language within the European Union will officially come to an end
articles.content:
Irish will achieve full status as an official language of the European Union as of Saturday, January 1, 2022.
It will see all documents published by the EU translated into Irish, as a derogation arr… [+2416 chars]
